channel.title: HKG:386 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China’s Oil Majors Plot Shift to New Fuels and Fine Chemicals
item.description: China’s state oil majors are racing to keep up with the nation’s breakneck energy transition, shifting operations from loss-making gasoline and diesel to alternative fuels and high-end chemicals.
